author: leolara
content: Perhaps a bit off-topic but I wanted to share this thought with other CDAP fellows. Microsoft has announced the launch of ARM based PCs after Apple already is moving to ARM full steam.  We are seeing the beginning of the end of the ARM-Intel flippening. Perhaps the Ethereum flippening will happen in a similar fashion, slowly step by step, one piece after the other

author: potuz
content: I've been hearing since the 80s that RISC was the future.
